de.mrapp.android.adapter.list.enablestate

Interface ListEnableStateListener<DataType>

  • Type Parameters:
    DataType - The type of the observed adapter's underlying data

    public interface ListEnableStateListener<DataType>
    Defines the interface, all listeners, which should be notified, when an item of a ListAdapter has been enabled or disabled, must implement.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onItemDisabled(ListAdapter<DataType> adapter, DataType item, int index)
      The method, which is invoked, when an item has been disabled.
      void onItemEnabled(ListAdapter<DataType> adapter, DataType item, int index)
      The method, which is invoked, when an item has been enabled.

    • Method Detail

      • onItemEnabled

        void onItemEnabled(@NonNull
                   ListAdapter<DataType> adapter,
                   @NonNull
                   DataType item,
                   int index)
        The method, which is invoked, when an item has been enabled.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapters as an instance of the type ListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        item - The item, which has been enabled, as an instance of the generic type DataType. The item may not be null
        index - The index of the item, which has been enabled, as an Integer value

      • onItemDisabled

        void onItemDisabled(@NonNull
                    ListAdapter<DataType> adapter,
                    @NonNull
                    DataType item,
                    int index)
        The method, which is invoked, when an item has been disabled.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapters as an instance of the type ListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        item - The item, which has been disabled, as an instance of the generic type DataType. The item may not be null
        index - The index of the item, which has been disabled, as an Integer value
